referencedBy.comment: The affected distance over which this calculated emission is measured.
An air draught level measure for this logistics transport means.
The measure of the diameter component for this spatial dimension.
The measure of the length of this logistics means of transport.
A measure of the loading length which is the length along a means of transport over which the complete width and height is needed for loading all the goods items in this supply chain consignment.
The measure of the external length required in a lane for this logistics transport means.
The maximum width measure for this logistics convoy.
The overall length measure of this logistics convoy.
